name: IKÆ Zombie Defense
description:
A three day game jam project.

You are a lone IKÆ cafeteria employee in the midst of a mysterious zombie apocalypse. The warehouse furniture has been infected and now it's coming for you. On the bright side you found the cure by accident - meatballs. 

Defend yourself by throwing meatballs at the zombies, and survive as long as possible.

Controls

- WASD to move
- Mouse to aim
- Space to shoot
- Click to pick up and place furniture
- Scroll to rotate furniture

Credits
